original: Natthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇāti?
analyzed: ▁natthi ▁puthujjan assa ▁paññā ▁pajān anā ▁ vicay o ▁pa vicay o ▁dhamma vicay o ▁sallakkh a ṇā ▁upa lakkhaṇ ā ▁pacc up alakkhaṇ āti

original: nanu atthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo …pe…
Hañci atthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo …pe…
paccupalakkhaṇā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Hañci puthujjano paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—

analyzed: ▁gilān apaccay a bh e sajj a parikkhār aṃ ▁dad eyyāti

original: Hañci puthujjano gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ dadeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: ▁hañci ▁puthujjan o ▁gilān apaccay a bh e sajj a parikkhār aṃ ▁dad eyya ▁no ▁ca ▁vata ▁ re ▁vattabbe

original: Puthujjano tena ñāṇena dukkhaṁ parijānāti, samudayaṁ pajahati, nirodhaṁ sacchikaroti, maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
analyzed: ▁puthujjan o ▁tena ▁ñāṇ ena ▁dukkhaṃ ▁parijānāti ▁samuday aṃ ▁pajahati ▁nirodh aṃ ▁sacchikar oti ▁maggaṃ ▁bhāv etīti
